meanings.definition: a wooden frame typically consisting of two upright posts supporting a crossbeam from which a noose is suspended, used for execution by hanging.
meanings.sent1: The condemned man stood beneath the gallowses, awaiting his fate.
meanings.sent2: The old western movie showed the outlaw meeting his end on the gallowses.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy magician accidentally made the rabbit disappear into the gallowses!
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds hung in the sky like ominous gallowses waiting to unleash a storm.
meanings.sent5: The history book vividly described the use of gallowses in medieval times.

meanings.definition: a pair of suspenders for holding up trousers.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa always wears his favorite gallowses to keep his pants up.
meanings.sent2: The stylish gentleman adjusted his gallowses before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his gallowses were the real heroes of his wardrobe.
meanings.sent4: She felt like her gallowses were the secret to her confident stride.
meanings.sent5: The fashion magazine featured different ways to style gallowses with outfits.
